About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Andre is an aspiring web developer and programmer. He holds a Bachelors degree in computer science from the University of the West Indies at the Mona campus. Andre was previously an intern as a Quality Assurance Analyst at eGov Jamaica Limited and worked as a developer at Aye Technologies taking on simialr responsibilities. Andre's main projects includes a calculator that he developed and his portfolio website.

eGov Jamaica Limited

Quality Assurance Analyst

Andre did a three month internship at eGov Jamaica Limited and did tasks that were in relation to a Quality Assurance Analyst.

Aye Technologies Limited

Developer

Andre also worked at Aye technologies Limited as a developer taking on similar tasks as an Assurance Analyst.
